=Brief Install Steps for Adobe LiveCycle Content Services ES2=

==Web Scripts Installation==
  # In ContentSpace use the Import action and import integratedsemantics.zip into /Company Home/Data Dictionary/Web Scripts Extensions/
  # restart LiveCycle JBoss service or use the "Refresh Web Scripts" button on http://hostname:8080/contentspace/service/ on the web script home page
  # verify install of webscripts on the web script home page by "Browse by Web Script Package" and you should see bunch of /integratedsemantics packages

==FlexSpaces "In Browser" Installation==
  # copy "flexspaces" folder to C:\Adobe\Adobe LiveCycle ES2\jboss\server\lc_turnkey\deploy\jboss-web.deployer\ROOT.war
  # configure domain (hostname or ip address) and port in FlexSpacesConfig.xml
  # configure FlexSpacesConfig.xml for LiveCycle instead of Alfresco
  # run  http://hostname:8080/flexspaces/FlexSpaces.html

==FlexSpaces AIR Installation==
  # Run FlexSpacesAir.air to install but don't launch right after install
  # configure domain (hostname or ip address) and port in FlexSpacesConfig.xml
  # configure FlexSpacesConfig.xml for LiveCycle instead of Alfresco
  # on 32 bit Windows FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in c:\Program Files\FlexSpacesAIR\FlexSpacesConfig.xml
  # on 64 bit Windows FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in C:\Program Files (x86)\FlexSpacesAir 
  # on Mac: In finder choose "Show Package Contents" on installed FlexSpacesAir.app, FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in contents/resources/
